name: fanSpeedMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the fan speed mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the fan speed mode.

parameters.name: predefinedFanSpeedMode
parameters.description: The predefined fan speed mode to set for the device.
